oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Trocan, Maria
Salerno, Emanuele
Cetin, Enis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Multimedia understanding
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/I.2.10 Vision and Scene Understanding
info:eu-repo/classification/acm/I.2.7 Language parsing and understanding,
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Institut Superieur d'Electronique de Paris (ISEP) hosted the International Workshop on Computational Intelligence for Multimedia Understanding (IWCIM 2014), organized by the ERCIM Working Group on Multimedia Understanding through Semantics, Computation and Learning (Muscle), 1-2 November 2014.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: In: Ercim News, vol. 100 pp. 52 - 53. Special theme: Scientific Data Sharing and Re-use. Costantino Thanos, Andreas Rauber (eds.). ERCIM, 2015.
